*Wrath and Kamodia nod* Wrath: Okay, Let's go. *Wrath and Kamodia walk out =
of the People's Base and go looking for new members*
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May=
 31, 2000 1:15 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "well, there could be o=
thers, but sadly, we don't have much in our group...." Dracona said.... "yo=
u could go out with me to look for more members, though.." Dracona said to =
Wrath and Kamodia.....
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveall=
lizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 12:0=
4 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Wrath stared confused and Kamod=
ia smiled and waved back* Wrath: Well, What should we do first? Any mission=
s that done? Kamodia: Any other bots I can meet? *Kamodia said hoping Draco=
na said yes*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:39 PM
      Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "now that your with us, understand that w=
e don't fight Maximals, we only fight Alliance and sometimes the Predacons,=
 we're in this to end this war...." Dracona pointed out.. "i'm Dracona, tha=
t's Plintissa, she's talking to the core consiousness of Suukie, and those =
are the Radicons, Stranato, Arrow, Stronghold, Airbomber, Scamrock, and Tra=
in Wreck...." Dracona pointed out....The Radicons stopped strangling each o=
ther and waved to Wrath and Kamodia......
        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
 Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:27 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
        *Wrath Kamodia payed very much attention to everything Dracona show=
ed them*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
 =
         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21=
 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Dracona smiled... "gr=
eat, we needed members..the radicons looked at each other angily....with on=
e punch Scamrock knocked down Arrow, but dracona stopped the fight quickly.=
.....Dracona pointed out the secrets of the base to Wrath and Kamodia, like=
 the secret passagewaay and stuff.....
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
            Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
            Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


            *Wrath and Kamodia begin walking around lookin=
g at all the CR Chamber's and Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it.=
 Wrath: It didn't take us too long to get in here. *They both turned to Dra=
cona* Kamodia: I wish to join. Wrath: Count me in for that.
              -=
---- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
    =
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              "yes, you can join us=
, the People's Group!..." Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but p=
romise not to ever let this slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a =
blindfold on Wrath and Kamodia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchi=
d doesn't like this then it doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken =
things...) took them through the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base.=
...it's all underground...." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wra=
th and Kamodia.....
                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
       From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
           Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
                Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                *Wrath and Kamodia turned to look* Wrath:=
 Do you know where we can get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona* *Wrath said a=
s he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she got her wish =
of meeting some more bots*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
                  Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  Dracona and company finishe re=
pairing all except for suukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take a lon=
g time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten about t=
heir mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona came =
from the secret passage way when nobody could possibly see, and walked off =
searching for some members......the Radicons bickered among themselves and =
Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, you 2,=
 over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the Radico=
ns drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played with hi=
s thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty to show that she came in peace=
....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
                    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9=
:12 PM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  =
  *Kamodia thought she saw something for a minute but figures its all in he=
r mond continues walking on*
                      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                      From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
    =
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      Plint=
issa looks in the distance and spots Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows t=
he would be good for the People's Group, but no wway she could invite them =
with these idiot Truths surrounding her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamod=
ia, hoping they'll see......
                        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                        From: ilovealllizards 
                    =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Monday, May 29, 2=
000 2:15 AM
                        Subject: Neo Beast Wars


             =
           *Wrath and Kamodia still stand on the outside of the Maximal bas=
e* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs=
* *Than he notices Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodi=
a: I'm not sticking around here when they don't want us. Wrath: How do you =
know that they don't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us than they'd answer =
us. *Kamodia turns and walks on looking for another base* *Wrath stands the=
re thinking about what Komodia said and comes to the fact that she's right*=
 Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wrath comes running up and catches up with Kamodia* K=
amodia: What made you leave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came=
 to the fact that I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I=
'm right. If they really wanted us then they would've answered us. *Wrath d=
oesn't answer and keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you =
know I'm right but you are right about that place being a dump. *They conti=
ue walking on*
